info.title: EasyLog API
info.description: Programmatic access to EasyLog REST endpoints

get.description: List all announcements for the authenticated user. Automatically marks unread announcements as retrieved.
Display a specific announcement. Automatically marks the announcement as retrieved if not already marked.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to view this announcement

post.description: Track user interaction with an announcement by recording status updates (retrieved, opened, scrolled_down, opened_attachment, confirmed_messages_read).

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized or invalid media_id

get.description: Get all bulletin chapters with their items, organized hierarchically. Includes items not assigned to any chapter as a synthetic first chapter with id=0. Only returns chapters and items accessible to the user's groups.
Display a listing of the resource.

post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: List forms in a category.
Retrieve the authenticated user's client configuration including default time periods, planning filters, and permissions.

get.summary: List datasources for the authenticated client

get.description: Retrieve a specific entry (entity datum) from a datasource entity.

List all follow-up categories for the current client. Categories are filtered by user group membership unless the user has the FollowUpOverrideGroups permission. Users will only see categories that are either assigned to their groups or have no group assignment (ungrouped).
Display the specified resource.
Display a listing of the resource.

post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.summary: List media for a follow-up entry
get.description: Get all media files attached to a follow-up entry.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to view this follow-up entry

post.summary: Upload media to a follow-up entry
post.description: Upload a file and attach it to a follow-up entry. Maximum file size: 10MB.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to update this follow-up entry

get.description: List all follow-ups for the current client. Follow-ups are filtered by user group membership unless the user has the FollowUpOverrideGroups permission. Users will only see follow-ups that are either assigned to their groups or have no group assignment (ungrouped).

post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: List categories for a form.

Display a listing of the resource.

Returns a paginated list of forms without the heavy content field.
Use the show endpoint to retrieve a specific form with its full content.

post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.description: Display the specified resource.

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

patch.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

get.description: Get form JSON schema.
List form versions.

get.summary: List project forms for this form
get.description: Get all ProjectForms (form-to-project associations) for a specific form. This helps map from a form ID to project form IDs which are needed for submissions.
Export allocations for a resource as an iCalendar (.ics) file using a secure token. Returns text/calendar format.
Get media file details including presigned download URL (valid for 1 hour) and available image conversions. Supports both numeric ID and UUID.

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: Request specific image conversion (preview, detail, max-height-300px, max-height-380px, max-height-850px, max-height-1000px)

200.description: Media details with presigned download URLs

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to view this media

404.description: Media not found or has no associated model

get.description: Generate and download a PDF report based on encrypted data parameters. Supports exporting single or multiple Eloquent models as PDF. Add ?as=html to view HTML instead of PDF.

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: Output format (html for preview, omit for PDF)

post.description: Create and persist a new submission with form data and uploaded files. Files should be uploaded first using the prepare endpoint. Supports both POST and PUT methods for compatibility.
Prepare file uploads for a submission by generating pre-signed S3 URLs. Call this before persisting the submission if files need to be uploaded.

token.description: File token to use in persist request

500.description: The entity is not a project.
Could not delete allocation type allocation.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Return projects starting on or after this date

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Return projects ending on or before this date

400.description: Could not store project, client id invalid.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter allocations starting on or after this date

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter allocations ending on or before this date

500.description: The entity is not a project.

get.summary: List projects for a resource group

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter allocations starting on or after this date

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter allocations ending on or before this date

500.description: The entity is not a resource.

400.description: Could not store project, client id invalid.

get.description: Get all media files attached to a submission.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to view this submission

post.description: Upload a file and attach it to a submission. Maximum file size: 10MB.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to update this submission

get.description: List all submissions for the current user. Regular users only see their own submissions. Users with ViewAllSubmissions permission can see all submissions in their client and filter by issuer_id.

parameters.name: issuer_id
parameters.description: Filter by issuer user ID (requires ViewAllSubmissions permission or see_other_submissions access)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter submissions created from this date

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter submissions created until this date

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of relationships to eager load (projectForm, issuer, media)

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to filter by issuer_id

get.description: Display a specific submission. Users can only view submissions they created or if they have ViewAllSubmissions permission.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to view this submission

delete.description: Delete a submission and all associated media. Users can only delete submissions they created or if they have ViewAllSubmissions permission.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to delete this submission

patch.description: Update submission data. Users can only update submissions they created or if they have ViewAllSubmissions permission. Only the data field can be updated.

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to update this submission

title.description: Chapter title, empty for unchaptered items

FormListItem.description: Lightweight form representation for list endpoints

Form.description: Complete form representation including content field (use for show/create/update endpoints)

content.description: JSON string containing form schema, widgets, and configuration

FormCollection.description: Non-paginated collection of forms with full content (used by nested endpoints like category forms)

MediaDetailResource.description: Detailed media resource with presigned S3 URLs

url.description: Presigned S3 URL for original file (expires in 1 hour)

conversions.description: Available image conversions with presigned URLs

fields.description: Additional allocation fields as key-value pairs. Values can be strings, numbers, booleans, objects, or arrays. Allowed fields depend on the resource configuration.
Additional allocation fields as key-value pairs. Values can be strings, numbers, booleans, objects, or arrays. Allowed fields depend on the resource configuration.

id.description: The ID of the allocation to update

fields.description: Additional allocation fields as key-value pairs. Values can be strings, numbers, booleans, objects, or arrays. Allowed fields depend on the resource configuration.

report_visible.description: Whether the project is visible in reports

exclude_in_workdays.description: Whether to exclude project in workday calculations

start.description: Project start date (not required for dateless projects)

end.description: Project end date (not required for dateless projects)

extra_data.description: Additional fields (can contain strings, numbers, booleans, objects, arrays). Keys must exist in extra_data_fields on the project datasource
